feed.title: Planka Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.20.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add Persian translation (#828)
  • feat: Languages with country codes
  • fix: Disable x-powered-by header (#829)

New Contributors

  • @mazyaryousefinia made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/828
  • @Nounoursdestavernes made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/829

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.20.0...v1.20.1

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.6
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.21.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Improvements for mobile version (#776)
  • feat: Colorize due date and make it toggleable (#845)
  • fix: Update Russian translation (#831, #832)
  • fix: Update healthcheck parameters in docker-compose-dev.yml (#834)

New Contributors

  • @jaycoolslm made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/834
  • @papiforcex made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/776
  • @glorpen made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/845

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.20.1...v1.21.0
